meanings.definition: A sac-like structure in the embryo of a bird, reptile, or mammal, containing waste materials.
meanings.sent1: The allantoids in the embryo help in waste removal.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the allantoids to understand embryonic development.
meanings.sent3: The allantoids in the embryo were like tiny garbage bags.
meanings.sent4: The allantoids were the janitors of the embryo, keeping it clean.
meanings.sent5: The allantoids were crucial for maintaining a healthy environment in the embryo.

meanings.definition: Relating to or resembling the allantois.
meanings.sent1: The allantoids characteristics were evident in the study.
meanings.sent2: Her dress had an allantoids pattern that resembled the allantois.
meanings.sent3: The allantoids design on the shirt was quite unique.
meanings.sent4: The allantoids color of the car made it stand out in the parking lot.
meanings.sent5: The allantoids features of the painting added a touch of nature to the room.
